reviews.review: Суперская игра,помоему одна из лучших серий кс, как по графике,так и по своей сущности. Супер!

It's like CS:GO But better because:
-Less Toxicity
-No skin bullshit(can still be downloaded as a mod)
-Many GMoD kids needs this

I like the simplicity of this game. sometimes you need that. it didn't take long to learn how the game worked, or how to win. the short game rounds keep things fresh, and the simple head to head combat style accomodates everyone, from the knifer to the sniper. One and a half (this is why im no longer a knifer ;) ) thumbs up.

The game where everyone is better than me.

This game is amazing. To start off if you're like me and you have a low end pc this game will still run really well. Plus for only 20 US dollars you get so much. You get the classic counter strike formula and maps with the thousands of free community maps and gamemodes. After 9 years there are still many gaming communitys to get into aswell. What im trying to say is that this game is defenitly worth the money and time. Get this game now.

Counter-Strike: Source is an excellent mix of tactical, real-time multiplayer and frustrating mistakes. Having played and loved CS 1.6, this game will always be close to me. It is incredibly similair, but has improved graphics, a larger user base, and allows you to track statistics and achievements through Steam. It is also similair to CS: GO, but does not include weapon skins, drops, or crates (personally, I find this better; you can focus on gameplay, rather than microtransactions). I would recommend Counter-Strike: Source to anyone.

Counter-Strike: Source bietet ein abwechslungreiches Multiplayergeschehen und ist ein Spaß für die ganze Familie. Selbst die Kleinsten finden sich relativ schnell zurecht. Daher empfehle ich das Spiel allen die auf spaßige Multiplayergefechte stehen und genug von dem 0815 CoD geballer haben.

It is the older version of Counter Strike Global Offense, but that doesn't stop me from playing it time to time instead of play global offense.
I still remember when I first bought the game expecting horrible gameplay, I had just bought it for the textures of Garry's Mod, then one day I decided to try it out. (I had about 200 hours on global offense). So I expected the same thing, but it wasn't.
It's an amazing game and had an amazing community like Counter Strike Global Offense.
The guns are different from cs go, but I think they have the same stats so far.
But we do have some ballad news.
Some controls are different from go so if you are a go player, then you might have some troubles like I did when I first played.
The textures aren't as advanced as cs go, but I still love them for what they are.
Overall, I give this game a pretty darn good 8/10!
(If you don't know, I'm a hater and I normally give everything like a 3/10)
